query:
SELECT 
  l.id as loja_id, 
  l.nome as loja_nome,
  gl.id as assoc_id,
  gl.gestorId as gestor_id_na_assoc,
  g.id as gestor_id_real,
  g.userId as gestor_user_id,
  u.id as user_id,
  u.name as user_name
FROM lojas l
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON l.id = gl.lojaId
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE l.nome IN ('Sm castanheira do ribatejo', 'Sm pesados porto', 'Viseu sm')
ORDER BY l.nome, gl.id
